title: Quicktime Player?

replies.body: QuickTime will record in your monitor's native resolution. If you have a 1080p monitor, then yes, it will record in full HD. I use it for recording, and it's great.

replies.body:
I've used QuickTime player in the past. Minecraft wasn't unplayable, but the frames suffered quite a bit and I had to lower the quality of the recording and the game settings.

That's only my experience. I've seen others have it completely unusable, and others who say it is completely fine.
